headline: Matador Resources Could Be Your Next Oil And Gas Winner
summary: Discover why Matador's recent growth, efficient operations, and attractive valuation make it a compelling investment opportunity for long-term investors.

headline: Better Oil Stock: Chevron vs. Devon Energy
summary: The core business model is what you need to think about if you are comparing oil industry players Devon Energy (NYSE: DVN) and Chevron (NYSE: CVX).  Here's why most investors will probably want to err on the side of caution.  There are subtle differences in the quality of crude oil depending on where it is drilled, but, for the most part, it is just a commodity product.
